description: BACKBONE Tools Registry - Discoverable tools for AI assistants

tools.name: Add Research Conviction
tools.description: Add a high-conviction ticker based on research. Boosts the ticker's score for 2 weeks.

examples.reason: Strong AI chip demand, datacenter growth
Government contracts expanding, AI platform adoption

tools.name: Get Research Convictions
tools.description: List all active research convictions with their effective boosts

tools.name: Analyze Ticker
tools.description: Get comprehensive analysis of a ticker including score breakdown, technicals, and conviction status

tools.name: Research Stock
tools.description: Deep research a stock using web search, news, and financial data. Returns structured findings.

tools.name: Generate Morning Brief
tools.description: Generate and optionally deliver the morning brief

tools.name: Portfolio Summary
tools.description: Get current portfolio status including positions, P&L, and signals

tools.name: Health Check
tools.description: Get latest health data from Oura (sleep, readiness, activity)

tools.name: World Pulse
tools.description: Get real-time snapshot of markets, news, and world events. The AI's eyes on what's happening.

focus.description: Focus area: markets, news, or all

tools.name: Market Monitor
tools.description: Monitor markets for significant events and generate alerts. Detects large SPY moves, extreme signals, position impacts.

tools.name: Fetch News
tools.description: Fetch latest news from financial and world sources. Updates the news cache for other tools.

category.description: News category: markets, business, tech, all

tools.name: Send Alert
tools.description: Send a proactive message to the user via WhatsApp. Use when discovering something important.

type.description: Alert type: alert, trade, market, news, health, goal, breakthrough

tools.name: Prediction Research
tools.description: Manage the automated ticker prediction research system. Runs at 8 PM daily, evaluates half the universe every 2 days.

action.description: Action: status, run, research, get, clear

tools.name: Markdown to LaTeX/PDF
tools.description: Convert markdown files to LaTeX (.tex), then compile to PDF. Supports headings, lists, tables, code blocks, checkboxes, links.

action.description: Action: convert (MD→LaTeX), compile (LaTeX→PDF), full (MD→LaTeX→PDF), check (verify toolchain)

input.description: Path to .md or .tex file (relative to projects/ or absolute)

output.description: Output path for .tex file (optional, defaults to same dir)

title.description: Document title (auto-detected from first H1 if omitted)

tools.name: Produce Deliverables
tools.description: Generate tangible deliverables (Excel, PDF, PowerPoint, Word) for all projects. Reads real project data and produces professional documents.

project.description: Specific project to produce for (optional, defaults to all)

tools.name: List Deliverables
tools.description: Show all project deliverables status — what's produced, what's pending, with file paths.
